title: ITC Grizzly
content:
Can anyone help me locate where I can purchase ITC Grizzly?

[http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/bitstream/itc-grizzly/](http://web.archive.org/web/20121205160236/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/bitstream/itc-grizzly/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/bitstream/itc-grizzly/")  
Designed by: Tom Carnase, Ronne Bonder

Thank you

Jonathan

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [griz.gif](http://web.archive.org/web/20121205160236/http:/typophile.com/files/griz.gif) | 2.29 KB |
author: jonathanlawley

comments.content:
"This ITC font, digitized by Bitstream, is no longer available due to ITC's termination of licensing agreements with many resellers in January 2001"

- - - - - - - - - - -

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20121205160236im_/http:/typophile.com/files/newH.png)
Why is it no longer avalible?

You will find something similar here :  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/kabel/black/](http://web.archive.org/web/20121205160236/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/kabel/black/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/kabel/black/")

I gess that one is closer from Font shop :  
 [http://typenav.fontshop.com/family.asp?GIFID=509273](http://web.archive.org/web/20121205160236/http:/typenav.fontshop.com/family.asp?GIFID=509273 "http://typenav.fontshop.com/family.asp?GIFID=509273")

I guess that would be the bear neccessities :-)

ChrisL

\>Why is it no longer available?

So, did you contact ITC?
Yes this post is continued in type id - Skateboarder
So, you only want to mix up everybody!
